definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: LeiTuos servant savannah untold hardships to find merlin to give him a prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 阿雷陀的仆人芬娜千辛万苦去找梅林要给他预言。

sentences.english: Melinda and Steve looked up fearfully when Veach walked in.
sentences.chinese: 维克走进屋时，梅林达和史蒂夫惊恐地抬起头来。

sentences.english: Merlin was also a zero-level Other, as was Jesus).
sentences.chinese: 梅林也是一个零度他者，跟耶稣一样。

sentences.english: Once again Merlin put the sword in the rock.
sentences.chinese: 梅林把剑再次的放回石头中。

sentences.english: Based on a king Arthur and the sorcerers story.
sentences.chinese: 本剧根据亚瑟王与魔法师梅林的故事改编。

sentences.english: Back at Wham-o, Knerr and Melin went into production with wooden hoops.
sentences.chinese: 回到公司后，内尔和梅林便开始制造木圈。

sentences.english: He was Prefect, Head Boy , and received a Medal for Magical Merit.
sentences.chinese: 他是级长，还获得了梅林魔法勋章。

sentences.english: Below was a plum tree grove with branches in full flower.
sentences.chinese: 这是一片梅林，红白两种梅花开得正繁。

sentences.english: The next day, morgana is merlin saved by magic.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，莫甘娜被梅林用魔法救活。

sentences.english: The main purpose of this study was to explore the feasibility of school-based curriculum development in Mai-lin elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项在梅林国小发展学校本位课程可行性的研究。

sentences.english: She studies under Merlin, but is plotting all the time to overthrow Arthur and his court at Camelot.
sentences.chinese: 师从梅林，却一直想要推翻亚瑟王的卡米洛特政权。

sentences.english: "Bob, " Hamelin said, "you've given us the key to something.
sentences.chinese: “鲍勃，”哈梅林说，“你给我们提供了破案的线索。

sentences.english: A boy that will, in time, father a legend. His name...Merlin.
sentences.chinese: 这个能够届时创造神话的男孩，他的名字叫，梅林。

sentences.english: Merlin streets in the Futian District, northern, central area known as the garden.
sentences.chinese: 梅林街道位于福田区的北面，有中心区后花园之称。

sentences.english: His closest advisor was Merlin, a powerful wizard.
sentences.chinese: 他最亲近的顾问是一位法术高强的男巫，名叫梅林。

sentences.english: Merlin was very sad, little mo exactly abandoned pitch dark.
sentences.chinese: 梅林很难过，小莫到底弃明投暗。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
